summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4618 for the improvement of 14th Avenue North, from East Howe Street to East Boston Street, and certain parts of certain streets and avenues, by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53736, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
